message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think you'll love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000.
Alice, $12,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm really interested in the product, but I can only go up to $8,500. Let me know what you think.
I understand you're interested in the product, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. It's a great deal, considering the value it brings to your business.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $11,000 is still a bit high for my budget. I'm willing to go up to $9,500. This would be a good deal for both of us. What do you say?
I appreciate your flexibility, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. It's a fair price considering the value the product will bring to your business.
